tc_identity module¶

This module is part of the nmeta suite running on top of Ryu SDN controller to provide network identity and flow (traffic classification) metadata

class tc_identity.IdentityInspect(_config)¶

Bases: object

This class is instantiated by tc_policy.py (class: TrafficClassificationPolicy) and provides methods to ingest identity updates and query identities

arp_reply_in(arped_ip, arped_mac, ctx)¶

Passed an IPv4 ARP reply MAC and IPv4 address and a context and add to relevant metadata

check_identity(policy_attr, policy_value, pkt, ctx)¶

Passed an identity attribute, value and packet and return True or False based on whether or not the packet strongly correlates to the identity attribute/value

dhcp_in(mac, ip, hostname, ctx)¶

Passed a MAC address, IP address, DHCP host name (from option 12), and a context and add to relevant metadata

dns_reply_in(queries, answers, ctx)¶

Passed a DNS parameters and a context and add to relevant metadata

get_augmented_fm_table(_flows)¶

Return the flow metadata table augmented with appropriate identity metadata

get_identity_nic_table()¶

Return the Identity NIC table

get_identity_system_table()¶

Return the Identity System table

ip4_in(pkt)¶

Passed an IPv4 packet and update NIC identity table (if required) with the IPv4 address if the MAC address matches an entry

lldp_in(pkt, dpid, inport)¶

Passed an lldp packet, a Data Path ID (dpid) and in port and update identity tables (if required) with this identity information

maintain_identity_tables()¶

Deletes old entries from Identity NIC and System tables. This function is passed maximum age values and deletes any entries in the tables that have a time_last that is older than that when compared to current time

valid_id_ip_service(ctx, ip, service)¶

Passed variables to look up a service in id_ip structure. Check that this service is valid (i.e. not stale) Return boolean
